    • Constructor Detail

      • CRCConfig

        public CRCConfig(java.lang.String name,
                 int bits,
                 long polynomial,
                 long initialValue,
                 long finalXORValue,
                 boolean reflectInputBits,
                 boolean reflectOutputBits,
                 boolean reflectOutputBytes)
        Create a new CRC configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of this CRC configuration.
        bits - Number of bits in final output.
        polynomial - Polynomial for this CRC.
        initialValue - Initial value for this CRC configuration.
        finalXORValue - XOR value to apply to the final CRC.
        reflectInputBits - Reverse the bits in the input bytes?
        reflectOutputBits - Reverse the bits in the output bytes?
        reflectOutputBytes - Reverse the output bytes?
